channel.title: Continuous gfx on npc?
channel.description: Ive been having problems with gfxs on npcs such as perfect pullback with bow as it shows the arrow being twichy on a npc but when using on pvp ( player vs player ) it goes perfectly? Can anyone lead me in the direction to fix this? Please no ' correct answer ' post :D unless you cant explain it much :\ Ty
